title: The Conundrum of Corporation and Nation | HuffPost Latest News
description: Either we lessen the dominance of big American corporations over American politics. Or we increase their allegiance and responsibility to America. It has to be one or the other. Americans can't thrive within a political system run largely by big American corporations -- organized to boost their share prices but not boost America.

title: Kamala Harris Will Go Around Congress To Build Support For Voting Rights | HuffPost Latest News
description: The vice president will work with corporations and civil rights groups to battle GOP efforts to restrict voting.

title: The Entire Global Economy Is Complicit In The Destruction Of The Amazon | HuffPost Latest News

title: How Amazon Is Holding Seattle Hostage | HuffPost Impact
description: The city wants to tax large corporations to pay for homeless housing, but Jeff Bezos isn't pleased.

title: Democrats Downplay Bonuses Employees Are Getting In Wake Of GOP Tax Law | HuffPost Latest News
